mapper.select: SELECT no,accu_use_date accuUseDate, member_no memberNo, regdate, point_amount pointAmount, point_type pointType, reference_key referenceKey, points_status pointStatus FROM points WHERE accu_use_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate}

SELECT no, accuUseDate, memberNo, regdate, pointAmount, pointType, referenceKey, pointStatus FROM( SELECT no, accuUseDate, memberNo, regdate, pointAmount, pointType, referenceKey, pointStatus, rownum r FROM( SELECT no, accu_use_date accuUseDate, member_no memberNo, regdate, point_amount pointAmount, point_type pointType, reference_key referenceKey, points_status pointStatus FROM POINTS WHERE points_status = 'a' AND member_no=#{memberNo} ORDER BY regdate DESC)) WHERE regdate BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY r

SELECT no, accuUseDate, memberNo, regdate, pointAmount, pointType, referenceKey, pointStatus, r FROM(SELECT no, accuUseDate, memberNo, regdate, pointAmount, pointType, referenceKey, pointStatus, rownum r FROM( SELECT no, accu_use_date accuUseDate, member_no memberNo, regdate, point_amount pointAmount, point_type pointType, reference_key referenceKey, points_status pointStatus FROM POINTS WHERE points_status = #{pointsStatus} AND member_no=#{memberNo} ORDER BY regdate DESC)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO points (no, accu_use_date, member_no, regdate, point_amount, point_type, reference_key, points_status) VALUES (points_seq.nextval, systimestamp, #{memberNo}, systimestamp, 300, 'r', #{referenceKey}, 'a')
